scripts.start:server:dev: docker-compose -f _dev.yml up mongodb redis -d && cd server/ && yarn start:dev
scripts.build:server: cd server/ && docker build -t senytera/live-workspace-server -f Dockerfile.prod .
scripts.build:client: cd client/ && docker build -t senytera/live-workspace-client -f Dockerfile.prod .
scripts.lint: cd server && yarn lint && cd ../client && yarn lint
